LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_PartPack.label: synstruct part pack
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_PartPack.description: This pack of half-assembled parts is designed to replace standard components ranging from whole legs and arms to intricate batteries and adaptors. Basic materials are included for rapid creation of more specific pieces.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RepairStimMinor.desc: A small, simple assembled kit of industrial components, and tools for assisting and stimulating synstruct repairs. The kit lacks a number of very helpful assets for more serious injuries or operations, and is suited more for battlefield triage than professional use.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RepairStim.label: repair stim
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RepairStim.descripti: An assembled kit of industrial components and tools for assisting and stimulating mechanical repairs. Stimulation kits like this are the core tools of any synstruct's artificer who believes in quality. Well-suited to a range of tasks, it is functionally capable and practical.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RepairStimUltra.desc: An array of high-tech tools for assisting and stimulating mechanical repairs. Relatively uncommon outside Glitterworlds, kits like these are highly prized by artificers and any self-respecting synstruct. This can make even poor artificers seem very competent.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RestructKitSapient.d: A one-use highly specialized suite of tools and components specifically designed to recover and restore a lost sapient synstruct's personality and consciousness. Due to those precisely specialized tools, these are useless for resuscitating non-sapient synstructs. Synstructs which have had their core destroyed cannot be recovered, but these tools would still be necessary to reconstruct the body.\n\nSynstructs resurrected with these tools must undergo a long startup sequence to return to full functionality.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RestructKitDrone.des: A one-use suite of tools and components specifically designed to recover and restore a lost sapient synstruct's personality and consciousness. LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_CoolantPack.label: coolant pack
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_CoolantPack.descript: A tightly sealed package of coolant for synstructs that can consume it to replenish internal coolant reserves. It only fills the reserve and can not replenish immediately lost coolant.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_LubricantPack.label: lubricant pack
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_LubricantPack.descri: A tightly sealed package of lubricant for synstructs that can consume it to replenish internal lubricant reserves.
